>> api/deployment.yaml
name: api
env:
  - name: DATABASE_URL
    value: postgres://localhost
  - name: REDIS_URL
    value: redis://localhost
  - name: DEBUG
    value: true
ports:
  - containerPort: 8080
  - containerPort: 8443

>> worker/deployment.yaml
name: worker
env:
  - name: QUEUE_NAME
    value: tasks
ports:
  - containerPort: 9000
